metadata.Title: CVE-2021-39520 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in libjpeg through 2020021. A NULL pointer dereference exists in the function BlockBitmapRequester::PushReconstructedData() located in blockbitmaprequester.cpp. It allows an attacker to cause Denial of Service.

notes.Note: jdstrand> libjpeg-turbo is a fork of libjpeg8 mdeslaur> file doesn't exist in libjpeg-turbo eslerm> libjpeg-turbo/libjpeg6b/libjpeg8/libjpeg9 are from different codebases only libjpeg is affected

criterions.comment: libjpeg package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
